---
title: "Compare Against BayesFactor with 1-RE Term"
output: html_notebook
---

# Prepare Data

```{r, message=FALSE}
data("fhch2010", package = "afex")

library("tidyverse")

fhch <- as_tibble(fhch2010) %>% 
  filter(correct)

fhch2 <- fhch %>% 
  group_by(id, stimulus) %>% 
  nest() %>% 
  mutate(samp = map(data, ~.[1:5,])) %>% 
  select(id, stimulus, samp) %>% 
  unnest()
```

# Compute Bayes Factor with bfrms
```{r, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
library("bfrms")
options(contrasts = c("contr.bayes", "contr.poly"))
fit1 <- bfrm(rt ~ task + (1|id), 
             fhch2, 
             iter = 25000, warmup = 1000,
             cores = 4)
fit0 <- bfrm(rt ~ 1 + (1|id), 
             fhch2, 
             iter = 25000, warmup = 1000,
             cores = 4)
```

```{r}
bayes_factor(fit1, fit0, silent = TRUE)
```

# Compare to BayesFactor
```{r, message=FALSE}
library("BayesFactor")
mod1 <- lmBF(rt ~  task + id, fhch2, whichRandom = "id", 
             rscaleFixed = 0.5, rscaleRandom = 0.5)
mod0 <- lmBF(rt ~  1 + id, fhch2, whichRandom = "id", 
             rscaleFixed = 0.5, rscaleRandom = 0.5)
mod1 / mod0
```
